short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly lookup the highlighted text on Wikipedia

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wikipedia editors will find this extension particularly useful, but it can be used by anyone. With this add-on you can easily lookup information on Wikipedia - just highlight a word or phrase in any web page, right click on it and select "Search Wikipedia for ...". This will open in a new tab with your search results on Wikipedia.org.
